original: @56a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @56a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: si t'a ta pa tree n'a ma aa pa r'a dzi t'a s'a dha nam /
analyzed: si t'a ta pa tree n'a ma aa pa r'a dzi t'a s'a dha nam /
translated: Sita-pattra-nama-aparajita-sadhana

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
translated: The practice of Aparajita Sitapattra

original: 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to Noble Sitapattra

original: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
analyzed: sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la /
translated: As previously taught, in one's heart, on a moon mandala,

original: aom gyi sa bon dkar po las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba zhal gsum pa /
analyzed: aom gyi sa bon dkar po las yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdugs dkar mo can zhes bya ba zhal gsum pa /
translated: from the white seed syllable Om, the complete Aparajita Sitapattra arises, with three faces,

original: phyag drug ma /
analyzed: phyag drug ma /
translated: six arms,

original: zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum mo //
analyzed: zhal so so la spyan gsum gsum mo //
translated: and three eyes in each face.

original: yan lag thams cad dang rtsa ba'i zhal ni dkar po'o //
analyzed: yan lag thams cad dang rtsa ba'i zhal ni dkar po'o //
translated: All the limbs and the main face are white,

original: sngon po dang dmar po ni g-yon pa dang g-yas kyi zhal lo //
analyzed: sngon po dang dmar po ni g-yon pa dang g-yas kyi zhal lo //
translated: with the left and right faces blue and red.

original: 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang gzhu ni g-yas kyi phyag na'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo dang lcags kyu dang gzhu ni g-yas kyi phyag na'o //
translated: In the right hands she holds a wheel, goad, and bow,

original: rdo rje dkar po dang mda' dang / zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub ni g-yon gyi phyag na'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dkar po dang mda' dang / zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub ni g-yon gyi phyag na'o //
translated: A white vajra and arrow, along with a lasso, are in the left hands.

original: khro po'i lta stangs dang bcas pas gza' thams cad 'joms par byed ma /
analyzed: khro po'i lta stangs dang bcas pas gza' thams cad 'joms par byed ma /
translated: She has a wrathful gaze and destroys all the planets.

original: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bzas rnam par brgyan ma /
analyzed: lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang na bzas rnam par brgyan ma /
translated: She is adorned with divine ornaments and garments.

original: rnam par snang mdzad spyi bor gnas par bsams la /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad spyi bor gnas par bsams la /
translated: Visualize Vairocana residing on her head.

original: phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: One should bind the consort.

original: de la g-yas pa'i lag pa'i khu tshur dang / sdigs mdzub ni snying gar yang dag par bzhag la /
analyzed: de la g-yas pa'i lag pa'i khu tshur dang / sdigs mdzub ni snying gar yang dag par bzhag la /
translated: For that, the right hand is in a fist with the threatening forefinger placed at the heart.

original: g-yon pa'i lag pa rdo rje khu tshur steng du 'phyar ba'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i lag pa rdo rje khu tshur steng du 'phyar ba'o //
translated: The left hand is in a vajra fist raised upward.

original: bzlas pa ni /
analyzed: bzlas pa ni /
translated: The mantra is:

original: aom s'i t'a ta pa tre /
analyzed: aom s'i t'a ta pa tre /

analyzed: 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gdugs dkar mo can gyi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzogs so //
